name: Luminai
headline: Luminai helps automate repetitive manual work away from your missionâ¦
description:
Luminai helps automate repetitive manual work away from your mission critical business processes. We're serving customers across insurance, healthcare, financial services, and more. Visit our website and see our customer case studies below:

https://luminai.com

Grateful to be backed by General Catalyst, Craft Ventures, Y Combinator, Moxxie Ventures, Caffeinated Capital, Unshackled Ventures, Scribble Ventures, Shrug Capital, Underscore VC, Weekend Fund, Liquid 2 Ventures, Nikhil Basu Trivedi, Yuri Sagalov, Chris Golda, Basement Fund, the founders and CEOs of Dropbox, Flexport, Notion, Deel, Front, Ramp, Coda, Rappi, Twitch, Lever, Algolia, Thredup, Pagerduty, Sendbird, the COO's of Stitchfix/Rippling, and the former heads of product of Twitter, Instagram, and Uber. Weâve raised $20 million till date. 

Weâre hiring across all roles!

founders.name: Kesava Kirupa Dinakaran, Founder
founders.description: Kesava is the CEO of Luminai. He's survived off hackathon prize money in Silicon Valley and also holds two world records solving Rubik's cubes.

# Reliably delegate mission-critical work to computers
Luminai executes the manual, repetitive parts of your business processes, seamlessly integrating into your existing systems and ways of working.
[Request a demo![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcbab37f47dc9703a1f247_CaretRight.svg)](https://www.luminai.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd6136593738f6cb84d48_image%209.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/6724fa6588163e5b2a2e16d5_Curana.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/6724fa8425b709aff2e2c3dc_SoFi.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd614e71cf08c99b07367_image%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/6724faa0e9702dcad1d3c2b7_Rothman.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd613dab337dee078d90d_image%204.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd61422009818ea5604d3_image%205.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/6724fab90da6df40aebc70df_RealReal.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b4461a_accolade.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd613bbccf79f550340b2_image%2010.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd6136593738f6cb84d48_image%209.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/6724fa6588163e5b2a2e16d5_Curana.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/6724fa8425b709aff2e2c3dc_SoFi.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd614e71cf08c99b07367_image%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/6724faa0e9702dcad1d3c2b7_Rothman.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd613dab337dee078d90d_image%204.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd61422009818ea5604d3_image%205.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/6724fab90da6df40aebc70df_RealReal.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b4461a_accolade.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd613bbccf79f550340b2_image%2010.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65dcd1c9ef3be106eb3beba6_CS%20team.png)
“Integrating Luminai was the key to Ops reaching our efficiency goals last year. The speed and efficiency it brought to handling multiple sensitive use-cases with rapid SLAs is remarkable. We were able to increase the team's capacity by more than 35% in just several weeks of the partnership.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65e5cf65be750ca9fb54cdb4_Andrew%20Garcia.png)
Andrew Garcia
Director, Strategic Operations @ Modern Health
“Luminai first helped us automate our credit card disputes/chargeback process. We were targeting a 5% improvement in win rates, but got 20% - way more than we expected! Not to mention more time to take on higher value work. They are a valuable partner to Super.com, allowing us to scale while staying lean."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65e5cf6587ba6fda78a987c4_Sarah%20Boehmer.png)
Sarah Boehmer
Director, Strategic Operations @ Super
“What used to be a manual process now happens seamlessly, saving us so much time. We can now actually focus on adding value through customer care rather than drowning in tedious, repetitive tasks. The Luminai team is also so easy to work with and I appreciate their level of professionalism.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65f228f1ee7e79717f1a83ce_Adrian.png)
Adrian Narvaez
Community Manager @ Strava
## The state of work today is inefficient.
Enterprise companies across healthcare, consumer, and financial services are overwhelmed with manual, repetitive workflows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65ddf5071ec1e00fe6d293c4_Frame%2032.svg)
Excessive context switching between different apps, software and processes
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65ddf50756b6e7c68ee9ca42_Frame%2033.svg)
Copying and pasting between internal and external systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65ddf507d0e5a397e7cdb49f_Frame%2033-1.svg)
Manual data entry / manual calculations / manual reporting
These tedious tasks lead to massive productivity gaps, errors, burnout and lost revenue.
## We are reinventing how companies get work done.
Luminai is a self-sustaining LLM based system that drives automation in your most mission-critical processes.
#### 1
Upload Standard Operating Procedure
Upload a plain english documented SOP of your processes to the Luminai platform.‍
#### 2
Interpret SOP into steps
Using purpose built technology, Luminai analyses and compiles the information and builds out a reliable task deployment.
#### 3
Build out one-click workflow
Luminai systems then use a keyboard and mouse like a human would to complete the steps within your SOP.
## AI systems that fitseamlessly into your business.
Luminai is the most flexible and efficient way to put automation in the hands of your workforce to help them deliver real impact.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df887b7026f45f99b4c0fb_Healthcare.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df8913b7756542f38c1221_Healthcare.svg)

## Why partner with Luminai?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df910c5d94cee92625e7e7_Frame%202094.svg)
Automate any workflow
End-to-end or with a human in the loop
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df91e2704325af65e70d06_Frame%202094-1.svg)
Seamless Integration
Quick onboarding time (2-3 weeks)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df91e2a2ad65359d396f4d_Frame%202094-2.svg)
Zero resources to deploy
No client engineering resources required
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df91e25cddbd08b85a1c40_Frame%202094-3.svg)
Minimized Risk
All data stays local - no additional security/privacy risks
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df91e2cbea9a3c4c7d561b_Frame%202094-4.svg)
Retain your existing systems
Platform agnostic and can operate without API integrations
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df91e2291476301f7b5b6c_Frame%202094-5.svg)

## The state of work today is inefficient.
Enterprise companies across healthcare, consumer, and financial services are overwhelmed with manual, repetitive workflows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65ddf5071ec1e00fe6d293c4_Frame%2032.svg)
Excessive context switching between different apps, software and processes
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65ddf50756b6e7c68ee9ca42_Frame%2033.svg)
Copying and pasting between internal and external systems
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65ddf507d0e5a397e7cdb49f_Frame%2033-1.svg)
Manual data entry / manual calculations / manual reporting
These tedious tasks lead to massive productivity gaps, errors, burnout and lost revenue.
## We are reinventing how companies get work done.
Luminai is a self-sustaining LLM based system that drives automation in your most mission-critical processes.
#### 1
Upload Standard Operating Procedure
Upload a plain english documented SOP of your processes to the Luminai platform.‍
#### 2
Interpret SOP into steps
Using purpose built technology, Luminai analyses and compiles the information and builds out a reliable task deployment.
#### 3
Build out one-click workflow
Luminai systems then use a keyboard and mouse like a human would to complete the steps within your SOP.
## AI systems that fitseamlessly into your business.
Luminai is the most flexible and efficient way to put automation in the hands of your workforce to help them deliver real impact.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df887b7026f45f99b4c0fb_Healthcare.png)

## Why partner with Luminai?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df910c5d94cee92625e7e7_Frame%202094.svg)
Automate any workflow
End-to-end or with a human in the loop
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df91e2704325af65e70d06_Frame%202094-1.svg)
Seamless Integration
Quick onboarding time (2-3 weeks)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df91e2a2ad65359d396f4d_Frame%202094-2.svg)
Zero resources to deploy
No client engineering resources required
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65d490ee0eccc6ba78b445ee/65df91e25cddbd08b85a1c40_Frame%202094-3.svg)

generated_description:
Luminai is a San Francisco-based startup founded in 2019 that focuses on automating repetitive manual tasks so businesses can concentrate on their mission-critical processes. It’s essentially your turbocharger for operations, transforming the way companies, particularly in the insurance, healthcare, and financial services sectors, handle workflow bottlenecks.

The problem it's tackling is huge. Many enterprises are bogged down by inefficient manual processes—think excessive data entry, context switching, and cumbersome workflows. Luminai streamlines this with its self-sustaining system that leverages advanced AI to manage and automate these tedious tasks seamlessly. Users simply upload their Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), and Luminai interprets and executes these processes. It’s like having a digital assistant that doesn’t just take notes but actually gets stuff done.

Backed by notable investors like General Catalyst, Y Combinator, and Craft Ventures, Luminai has raised $20 million to date and is part of Y Combinator’s Summer 2020 batch. With a team of 31, they’re ramping up their operations aggressively and are on the lookout for new talent across all roles.

Luminai is particularly appealing because it requires no heavy integration efforts, ensuring that companies can maintain their existing systems while benefiting from enhanced operational efficiency. Their solutions range from automating operations in healthcare—like patient scheduling and claims processing—to optimizing financial services operations such as loan processing and disputes.

If you find your team swamped with manual tasks, Luminai is worth a look. They promise a swift onboarding in as little as 2-3 weeks and focus on keeping your data secure. This kind of innovation is key to fostering a more efficient workplace in the evolving digital landscape.

For a deep dive into their offerings or to see how they’ve helped other businesses, check out their customer case studies and demos at [Luminai's Website](https://luminai.com).
